text: I love writing and I you know and like
like you said I write every day and I
just love doing it it's just it's just a
wonderful thing some of my stories work
some of them don't work some of them are
wild and I love them but you know they
certainly don't fit into any kind of
normal system that I know about some of
them are like you know fit perfectly
into you know like a structure that
somebody want to publish and deal with I
I it doesn't matter to me cuz I'm
writing I'm using language I'm I'm using
that language to tell stories and even
more so to get ideas
across uh and I just I love that and
I've always loved it and uh the fact but
you know I I tell people people come to
me and they'll say so when you start
writing you you were trying to become a
successful writer I said no when I
became a writer I started studying
writing what I wanted to do is write a
short story that
worked and I never really thought I'd be
successful I never thought I'd get
booked published I mean this was
something completely Beyond me you know
uh the fact that it's happened is
wonderful but it's not something that I
was aiming
for I have never thought that I've
sacrificed anything being a writer that
might not be true maybe I have
sacrificed something maybe I've given
something up but I can't think of it one
of the things I love about being a
writer is this I wake up every day and I
write for 3 hours I wake up early so
like you know 6 7:00 in the morning I
write till 9: or 10 uh I live in New
York nobody's even like you know
breathing until 9 or 10:00 in the
morning and so uh it's like my writing
life is completely removed from the rest
of my life so then you know I can start
you know calling people going out having
lunches you know doing things living a
life uh and I've already done all my
writing uh I don't have to think about
it again until tomorrow morning at 6:00
or 7 so it feels like writing is a is is
almost a place of dream for me and I
don't have to give up anything in order
to do
it
